divs: Sighting DetailsI was on a flight from Cincinnati to Houston last night, I was listening to some music and I was looking out the window on occasion to watch the sun set. I looked this particular time and I was noticing a cloud formation and I looked to the right and I saw another plane going by the opposite direction and I noticed the contrail. I looked back at the clouds and I noticed a cigar shaped object and as I looked another plane with a contrail was heading in the direction the the right of the objecta dn I thought that it was rather large in comparison to the plane. I continued to watch the object as we were passing south and it became a dot that I watched until it was out of sight.
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around May 14th 2006
Summary: Very LARGE cigar shape, slow moving
